00023 void printSocketError()
00024 {
00025         int realError = WSAGetLastError();
00026         char *reason;
00027 
00028         switch(realError)
00029         {
00030                 case WSANOTINITIALISED: reason = "A successful WSAStartup must occur before using this API."; break;
00031                 case WSAEFAULT: reason = "The Windows Sockets implementation was unable to allocated needed resources for its internal operations, or the readfds, writefds, exceptfds, or timeval parameters are not part of the user address space."; break;
00032                 case WSAENETDOWN: reason = "The network subsystem has failed."; break;
00033                 case WSAEINVAL: reason = "The timeout value is not valid, or all three descriptor parameters were NULL."; break;
00034                 case WSAEINTR: reason = "The (blocking) call was canceled via WSACancelBlockingCall."; break;
00035                 case WSAEINPROGRESS: reason = "A blocking Windows Sockets 1.1 call is in progress, or the service provider is still processing a callback function."; break;
00036                 case WSAENOTSOCK: reason = "One of the descriptor sets contains an entry which is not a socket."; break;
00037                 default: reason = "Unknown."; 
00038         }
00039 
00040         printf("Select error: %s\n", reason);
00041         return;
00042 }

00045 void NetIP_DeleteAllSockets()
00046 {
00047         while (sockList)
00048                 delete sockList;
00049 }

00052 void NetIP_DoSelect(struct timeval *tv, int handleInput) 
00053 {
00054 
00055         kernelProcs = Kernel::getTotalProcesses();
00056 
00057         PROFILER(6);
00058         fd_set inp_set, out_set, exc_set;
00059         int maxdesc;
00060         CSocket *pSock;
00061 
00062         checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00063 
00064 
00065         FD_ZERO(&inp_set);
00066         FD_ZERO(&out_set);
00067         FD_ZERO(&exc_set);
00068 
00069         maxdesc = 0;
00070 
00071         if (sockList)
00072                 sockList->checkMagic();
00073 
00074   // set everything up for the select
00075         for (pSock = sockList; pSock; pSock = pSock->nextSock) 
00076         {
00077 
00078                 PROFILER(7);
00079 
00080                 checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00081 
00082                 if ((pSock->deleteFlag&1) || pSock->m_sock == INVALID_SOCKET)
00083                         continue;
00084 
00085                 if (handleInput)
00086                         FD_SET(pSock->m_sock, &inp_set);
00087 
00088                 FD_SET(pSock->m_sock, &exc_set);
00089 
00090                 if (pSock->HasOutput())
00091                         FD_SET(pSock->m_sock, &out_set);
00092 
00093                 if ((int)pSock->m_sock > maxdesc)
00094                         maxdesc = (int)pSock->m_sock;
00095 
00096                 if (pSock->nextSock)
00097                         pSock->nextSock->checkMagic();
00098          }
00099   
00100         int selRet = 0;
00101 
00102         // do the select (duration passed in as tv, NULL to block until event)
00103         selRet = select(maxdesc+1, &inp_set, &out_set, &exc_set, tv) ;
00104         if (selRet == SOCKET_ERROR)
00105         {
00106                 printSocketError();
00107                 return;
00108         }
00109 
00110         checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00111 
00112         // handle input, output, and exceptions
00113 
00114         if (selRet)
00115         {
00116                 if (sockList)
00117                         sockList->checkMagic();
00118 
00119                 for (pSock = sockList; pSock; pSock = pSock->nextSock) 
00120                 {
00121 
00122                         PROFILER(9);
00123 
00124 
00125                         checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00126 
00127                         if ((pSock->deleteFlag&1) || pSock->m_sock == INVALID_SOCKET)
00128                                 continue;
00129 
00130                         if (FD_ISSET(pSock->m_sock, &exc_set))
00131                         {
00132                                 checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00133                                 pSock->HandleException();
00134                                 checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00135                         }
00136 
00137                         if (!(pSock->deleteFlag&1) && FD_ISSET(pSock->m_sock, &out_set))
00138                         {
00139                                 checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00140                                 pSock->HandleOutput();
00141                                 checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00142                         }
00143 
00144                         if (   handleInput
00145                                 && !(pSock->deleteFlag&1) && FD_ISSET(pSock->m_sock, &inp_set))
00146                         {
00147                                 checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00148                                 pSock->HandleInput();
00149                                 checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00150                         }
00151 
00152                         if (pSock->nextSock)
00153                                 pSock->nextSock->checkMagic();
00154 
00155                  }
00156                 
00157                 if (sockList)
00158                         sockList->checkMagic();
00159         }
00160 
00161         unsigned int timeNow = timeGetTime();
00162 
00163         // handle deleting any sockets
00164         for (pSock = sockList; pSock; pSock = deleteLoopSock) 
00165         {
00166 
00167                 PROFILER(10);
00168 
00169                 if (pSock->timeOut) 
00170                 {
00171                         if (pSock->timeOut < timeNow)
00172                         {
00173                                 checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00174                                 pSock->TimeOut();
00175                                 checkSockets(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00176                         }
00177                 }
00178 
00179                 deleteLoopSock = pSock->nextSock;
00180                 if (pSock->deleteFlag&1) 
00181                 {
00182                         switch (pSock->deleteFlag) 
00183                         {
00184                           case 1:
00185                                         delete pSock;
00186                                         pSock = NULL;
00187                                         break;
00188                                 case 3:
00189                                         pSock->deleteFlag = 2;
00190                                         if (pSock->m_sock != INVALID_SOCKET) 
00191                                         {
00192                                                 closesocket(pSock->m_sock);
00193                                                 pSock->m_sock = INVALID_SOCKET;
00194                                         }
00195                                         break;
00196                         }
00197                 }
00198 
00199                 if (pSock && pSock->nextSock)
00200                         pSock->nextSock->checkMagic();
00201 
00202 
00203          }
00204  }

00211 NetOutList::NetOutList(CSocket *myOwner, char *myData, int mySize)
00212 {
00213         owner = myOwner;
00214         next = NULL;
00215         prev = owner->outListEnd;
00216         if (prev)
00217           prev->next = this;
00218         else
00219           owner->outList = this;
00220         owner->outListEnd = this;
00221         data = myData;
00222         size = mySize;
00223  }
00224 
00225 
00226 NetOutList::~NetOutList() 
00227 {
00228         if (next)
00229                 next->prev = prev;
00230         else
00231                 owner->outListEnd = prev;
00232 
00233         if (prev)
00234                 prev->next = next;
00235         else
00236                 owner->outList = next;
00237 
00238         delete [] data;
00239  }
00240 
00241 
00242 int NetOutList::Send() 
00243 {
00244         int rc = send(owner->m_sock, data+owner->sendofs, size-owner->sendofs, 0);
00245         if (rc > 0) 
00246         {
00247                 CSocket::outbound += rc;
00248                 assert(CSocket::outbound>0);
00249                 owner->sendofs += rc;
00250                 return 1;
00251         }
00252         else if (errno != EWOULDBLOCK)
00253                 owner->HandleException();
00254 
00255         return 0;
00256  }

00262 
00263 CSocket::CSocket()
00264 {
00265         magicNumber = MAGIC_NUMBER;
00266         nextSock = sockList;
00267         if (nextSock)
00268         {       
00269                 nextSock->checkMagic();
00270                 nextSock->prevSock = this;
00271         }
00272         prevSock = NULL;
00273         sockList = this;
00274         m_sock = INVALID_SOCKET;
00275         deleteFlag = 0;
00276         outList = outListEnd = NULL;
00277         sendofs = 0;
00278         timeOut = 0;
00279 }
00280 
00281 
00282 CSocket::~CSocket() 
00283 {
00284         if (nextSock)
00285                 nextSock->checkMagic();
00286 
00287         if (deleteLoopSock == this)
00288                 deleteLoopSock = nextSock;
00289 
00290         if (nextSock)
00291                 nextSock->prevSock = prevSock;
00292 
00293         if (prevSock)
00294                 prevSock->nextSock = nextSock;
00295         else
00296                 sockList = nextSock;
00297 
00298         if (m_sock != INVALID_SOCKET) 
00299         {
00300                 closesocket(m_sock);
00301                 m_sock = INVALID_SOCKET;
00302         }
00303 
00304         while (outList)
00305         {
00306                 delete outList;
00307         }
00308  }

00317 int CSocket::HasOutput()

00323 void CSocket::HandleException() 
00324 {
00325         deleteFlag |= 1;
00326 }

00328 
00329 void CSocket::HandleOutput() 
00330 {
00331         int fSent;
00332         do 
00333         {
00334                 fSent = outList->Send();
00335                 if (sendofs == outList->size) 
00336                 {
00337                         delete outList;
00338                         sendofs = 0;
00339                 }
00340         } while (fSent && outList);
00341 }

00344 void CSocket::Connect(unsigned int ip, unsigned int port, int fCoalesce) 
00345 {
00346         struct sockaddr_in sa;
00347         int x = 1;
00348 
00349         if ((m_sock = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, 0)) == INVALID_SOCKET)
00350                 return;
00351 
00352         if (!fCoalesce)
00353         {
00354                 setsockopt(m_sock, IPPROTO_TCP, TCP_NODELAY, (char *)&x, sizeof(x));
00355         }
00356 
00357         //      setsockopt(m_sock, SOL_SOCKET, SO_KEEPALIVE, (char *)&x, sizeof(x));
00358 
00359         sa.sin_family = AF_INET;
00360         sa.sin_addr.s_addr = htonl(ip);
00361         sa.sin_port = htons(port);
00362 
00363         if (connect(m_sock, (struct sockaddr *)&sa, sizeof(sa))) 
00364         {
00365                 closesocket(m_sock);
00366                 m_sock = INVALID_SOCKET;
00367         }
00368  }

00370 void CSocket::checkMagic()
00371 {
00372         if (!this)
00373         {
00374                 printf("This pointer is NULL.\n");
00375                 return;
00376         }
00377 
00378         if (magicNumber!=MAGIC_NUMBER)
00379         {
00380                 printf("Magic number corruption.\n");
00381     #ifdef WIN32
00382                 _asm int 3
00383     #endif
00384         }
00385 }

00400 
00401 void CListenSocket::Init(int portnum)
00402 {
00403         struct sockaddr_in sa;
00404         int x = 1;
00405 
00406         if ((m_sock = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, 0)) == INVALID_SOCKET)
00407         {
00408                 perror("CListenSocket::Init: socket");
00409                 EXIT_ASSERT
00410                 exit(1);
00411         }
00412 
00413         if (setsockopt(m_sock, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR, (char *)&x, sizeof(x))== SOCKET_ERROR) 
00414         {
00415                 perror("CListenSocket::Init: setsockopt");
00416                 closesocket(m_sock);
00417                 m_sock = INVALID_SOCKET;
00418                 EXIT_ASSERT
00419                 exit(1);
00420         }
00421         
00422         memset(&sa, 0, sizeof(sa));
00423         sa.sin_family = AF_INET;
00424         sa.sin_port = htons(portnum);
00425 
00426         // bind to port
00427         if (bind(m_sock, (struct sockaddr *)&sa, sizeof(sa)) == SOCKET_ERROR) 
00428         {
00429                 perror("CListenSocket::Init: bind");
00430                 closesocket(m_sock);
00431                 m_sock = INVALID_SOCKET;
00432                 EXIT_ASSERT
00433                 exit(1);
00434         }
00435 
00436         // set nonblocking - accept() blocks under some odd circumstances otherwise
00437         SetBlocking(0);
00438 
00439         // start listening
00440         if (listen(m_sock, 256) == SOCKET_ERROR) 
00441         {
00442                 closesocket(m_sock);
00443                 m_sock = INVALID_SOCKET;
00444                 EXIT_ASSERT
00445                 exit(1);
00446         }
00447 
00448         port = portnum;
00449         journalEntry(GLOBAL_MSG, NORMAL_MSG, 0, "Socket Listening on port %d", portnum);
00450         //logEntry(Socket_listening, -1, -1, -1, portnum);
00451 }

00453 
00454 void CListenSocket::InitScan(int portnum_min, int portnum_max) 
00455 {
00456         struct sockaddr_in sa;
00457         int portnum, x = 1;
00458 
00459         if ((m_sock = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, 0)) == INVALID_SOCKET)
00460         {
00461                 EXIT_ASSERT
00462                 exit(1);
00463         }
00464 
00465         if (setsockopt(m_sock, SOL_SOCKET, SO_REUSEADDR, (char *)&x, sizeof(x)) == SOCKET_ERROR) 
00466         {
00467                 closesocket(m_sock);
00468                 m_sock = INVALID_SOCKET;
00469                 EXIT_ASSERT
00470                 exit(1);
00471         }
00472 
00473         memset(&sa, 0, sizeof(sa));
00474         sa.sin_family = AF_INET;
00475         for (portnum = portnum_min; portnum < portnum_max; portnum++) 
00476         {
00477                 sa.sin_port = htons(portnum);
00478                 // bind to port
00479                 if (bind(m_sock, (struct sockaddr *)&sa, sizeof(sa)) != SOCKET_ERROR)
00480                         break;
00481         }
00482 
00483         if (portnum == portnum_max) 
00484         {
00485                 closesocket(m_sock);
00486                 m_sock = INVALID_SOCKET;
00487                 EXIT_ASSERT
00488                 exit(1);
00489         }
00490 
00491         // set nonblocking - accept() blocks under some odd circumstances otherwise
00492         SetBlocking(0);
00493 
00494         // start listening
00495         if (listen(m_sock, 8) == SOCKET_ERROR) 
00496         {
00497                 closesocket(m_sock);
00498                 m_sock = INVALID_SOCKET;
00499                 EXIT_ASSERT
00500                 exit(1);
00501         }
00502 
00503         port = portnum;
00504         journalEntry(GLOBAL_MSG, NORMAL_MSG, 0, "Socket Listening on port %d", portnum);
00505         //logEntry(Socket_listening, -1, -1, -1, portnum);
00506  }

00508 
00509 SOCKET CListenSocket::AcceptConnection(u_int *pAddr)
00510 {
00511         SOCKET new_sock;
00512         struct sockaddr_in sock;
00513         int size;
00514 
00515         size = sizeof(sock);
00516 
00517         if ((new_sock = accept(m_sock, (struct sockaddr *)&sock, &size))== INVALID_SOCKET)
00518                 return INVALID_SOCKET;
00519 
00520         if (getpeername(new_sock, (struct sockaddr *)&sock, &size) == SOCKET_ERROR)
00521         {
00522                 closesocket(new_sock);
00523                 return INVALID_SOCKET;
00524         }
00525         *pAddr = ntohl(sock.sin_addr.s_addr);
00526         return new_sock;
00527  }
00528 
00529 
00530 void SetBlocking(SOCKET m_sock, int block)
00531 {
00532         #ifdef WIN32
00533                 unsigned long val = block ? 0 : 1;
00534                 ioctlsocket(m_sock, FIONBIO, &val);
00535         #else
00536                 int val = fcntl(m_sock, F_GETFL, 0);
00537                 if (block)
00538                         val &= ~(O_NONBLOCK);
00539                 else
00540                         val |= O_NONBLOCK;
00541 
00542                 fcntl(m_sock, F_SETFL, val);
00543         #endif
00544 }

00557 /****************
00558         // Comment this code in to resove ipaddrs to names.

00564

00566                 {
00567                         n = lpHostEnt->h_name;
00568                 }
00569                 else
00570                 {
00571                         strcat(n, " <not found>");
